data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Xiaodan, Zheng, Wei, Funk, Vicki A., Li, Kexin, Zhang, Jie, Wen, Jun (2018): Home at last III: Transferring Uechtritzia and Asian Gerbera species into Oreoseris (Compositae, Mutisieae). PhytoKeys 96: 1-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.96.23142, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.96.23142
